definition: to care about/to mind
(located) at/(to be) in/to exist/in the middle of doing sth/(indicating an action in progress)
Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]
idea/meaning/thought/to think/wish/desire/intention/to expect/to anticipate
to pay no attention to/not to mind

sentences.english: Zhao Zigeng smiled, and did not care to verbal stimuli "."
sentences.chinese: 赵子庚笑笑，毫不在意并以言语刺激宇文。

sentences.english: He started another matter to enrage me, but I didn't care.
sentences.chinese: 他又提出另一问题，想以此激怒我，可我并没在意。

sentences.english: Pisces will generally not mind if the Aries wants to be the boss.
sentences.chinese: 双鱼通常不会在意白羊是否想成为老板。

sentences.english: The Boxer Band tunes in to historyThe Boxers’ negative image in the West is of little concern.
sentences.chinese: 当地毫不在意义和团在西方人眼中的负面形象。

sentences.english: Worry so many senses, and not care secular reality.
sentences.chinese: 如此的多感善愁，毫不在意世俗。

sentences.english: I have tried not to become too conscious of why exactly I came up with it.
sentences.chinese: 我已经试着让自己不要太在意捣鼓出这个书名的原因。

sentences.english: I'm very self-conscious about my health.
The farmyard must be moved, I grant you; but I am not aware of anything else.
sentences.chinese: 跟你说吧，那个农家院肯定要迁移，别的我都不在意。

sentences.english: I knowed you did it just for study, but I also felt down.
sentences.chinese: 如果这场感情中我是输定了，我也不会在意。

sentences.english: You will only injure yourself if you take notice of despicable enemies.
sentences.chinese: 如果去在意卑劣的敌人，反而会身受其害。

sentences.english: Frank doesn't care if Harry leaves or stays.
sentences.chinese: 佛兰克根本不在意哈里是去还是留。

sentences.english: I won't care, because I'll be wearing corduroy.
sentences.chinese: 我都不会在意，因为我会穿灯芯绒。

sentences.english: Big tech is returning cash to investors, and investors simply don't care.
sentences.chinese: 大型科技公司向投资者返现，但投资者根本就不在意。

sentences.english: But do you think Scrooge cared?Not at all.
sentences.chinese: 但是你认为史高基塔在意吗？

sentences.english: I think taxpayers wont mind spending on R&D works that DRDO takes up.
sentences.chinese: 我想纳税人不会在意DRDO进行的研发工作花钱。

sentences.english: Therefore this day and night rain, whether you care about, always thing-in-itself and song.
sentences.chinese: 因此这日夜雨，不论你是否在意，总是自在而歌。

definition: to care about/equivalent of 在於|在于[zai4 yu2]
to care about/to take seriously/to take to heart
to pay no attention to/not to mind
not to care
to care about/to take offense/to mind
to understand/to pay attention to/to take notice of
to bother about/to haggle/to bicker/to argue/plan/stratagem
to be indifferent/not to matter/cannot be said to be
to be concerned about/to care about
to regard as important/to care about
excessive/undue/overly
carefully/meticulously/to set one's heart on sth
to be disgusted with/to dislike/bad reaction/antipathy
to take into consideration/to attend to
meticulous/painstaking/deliberate
to neglect/to overlook/to ignore
